scripts.i18n:build: npm run i18n:pot && npm run i18n:json
scripts.i18n:pot: php -d xdebug.max_nesting_level=512 $(which wp) i18n make-pot --exclude="node_modules/,i18n/,assets/" --headers='{"Report-Msgid-Bugs-To":"https://woocommerce.com/my-account/create-a-ticket/", "language-team":"LANGUAGE <EMAIL@ADDRESS>"}' . i18n/metaps-for-wc.pot
scripts.make-pot: wp-env run cli --env-cwd=wp-content/plugins/Japanized-for-WooCommerce/ wp i18n make-pot ./ i18n/woocommerce-for-japan.pot --ignore-domain
scripts.make-json: wp-env run cli --env-cwd=wp-content/plugins/Japanized-for-WooCommerce/ wp i18n make-json i18n --no-purge
